Name: PvZ2_Prepreprelease_WWP3
NewFeatures: 修复机械牛大量的判定问题
新增棱镜草，鸡贼僵尸、钢琴僵尸
沙盒模式增加一键上盔甲按钮，滚轮切换，点击能给所有僵尸穿上对应盔甲，可以叠加
沙盒模式新增快捷键Ctrl，Ctrl+F全屏植物叶绿素，Ctrl+D全屏铲除，Ctrl+对应植物键位，全屏种植该植物
设置界面新增鼠标样式选择，分为Default（大鼠标），Soft（柔边大鼠标），Unchanged（系统鼠标）
EnNewFeatures: Fixed many bugs about Zombie Bull collision
Added Magnifying Grass, Pianist Zombie, Chicken Wrangler Zombie
A new button in Sandbox Level to wear armors on all zombies. Press it to wear. Scroll on it to switch the armors
New Keybinds in Sandbox Level. Ctrl + D, shovel all. Ctrl + F, all plants get plantfood. Ctrl + Seedpacket KeyBinds, plant on all over the lawn
New Setting for the mouse style in Setting Window
